name: konnektrt
description: A backend routing library for konnektjs

scripts.installer: npm run installGulp && npm run installBower && npm i && bower i
scripts.i: npm run installGulp && npm run installBower && npm i && bower i
scripts.installBower: npm list -g bower || npm i bower -g
scripts.installGulp: npm list -g gulp || npm i git+https://github.com/keleko34/gulp.git -g
